title: The 3 Essential Rules of Wealth Building
subtitle: Master the fundamental strategies for building wealth and securing your financial future.
content:
The 3 Essential Rules of Wealth Building

Here are the only three rules of wealth building you will ever need. I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager, and I create financial content for free so you don’t have to pay for it.

1. Start Today

If you start investing in your 20s, it takes about $10 a day to be a millionaire by retirement. If you wait until your 50s, you’re looking at around $1,900 a day. I’ll take the 20s!

2. Stay Consistent

I invest the exact same percentage of my income into the markets each and every month. As I get paid more, I naturally invest more without having to think about it, which keeps my investment habit consistent.

3. Ignore the Noise

Over the long term, markets go up. When that changes, don’t worry; I’ll let you know. Focus on your long-term strategy rather than short-term fluctuations.

If any of this information is helpful, please like and follow, and I’ll keep sharing insights to help you get one step closer to your financial goals.
